name: Starter Pack
detailed_description:
Get a head start against the rest of the fighters right away!



The fast T1E6

This Tier II light tank will guarantee you a strong start in World of Tanks Blitz. A powerful engine will quickly drive you to key positions and a gun with high damage per minute will easily destroy the enemy. Devastate your foes!

Gold

250 gold always come in handy. This sum is enough for a Garage slot, 100,000 credits, 1 day of Premium Account or 6,250 Free XP.

3 Days of Premium Account

  • Earn 50% more experience and credits for each battle. The more XP and credits you have, the closer you are to cool vehicles with top modules!
  • Battle using the Undeniable Advantage special camouflage that is only available to Premium Account owners.
  • Park your vehicles in the stunning, animated Garage with a cozy kitchen.

100,000 credits

It's enough to unlock all equipment for your T1E6 or buy a Tier IV tank or something else you like.

25 of each XP type and Rare Credit boosters

  • 25 Combat XP boosters to upgrade faster.
  • 25 Free XP boosters to research vehicles without even playing on them.
  • 25 Crew XP boosters to make the vehicle more effective and skilled.
  • 25 Credit boosters to make the battles even more profitable!

CVC Helmet Avatar

A tanker's helmet with the World of Tanks Blitz logo will be displayed next to your nickname in battle and in the Garage. This avatar can only be received together with some Steam add-ins. Wear it with pride!

short_description: The blistering Tier II light tank T1E6 will go into your service with a set of various resources and a unique avatar. Assume command and secure yourself a quick start in World of Tanks Blitz!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Czech*, Finnish*, Japanese*, Korean*, Polish*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Thai*, Traditional Chinese, Turkish*, Portuguese - Brazil*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8.0, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compliant video card with 256 MB RAM
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Storage: 3 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9 Mavericks
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Mac OS X 10.9 supported models: https://support.apple.com/kb/SP702

subs.option_text: World of Tanks Blitz - Starter Pack - 1,59€
